name: BeQRious
tag_list: qrcodes--mobile, marketing, nfc, near-field--communications, mobile-applications, mobile-websites
overview:
BeQRious is a Mobile Marketing Solutions Company.

The goal of BeQRious is to create effective and efficient mobile marketing campaigns for their clients. BeQRious is most known for their QR Code campaigns that include Tracking, Analytics and Customized Codes. To date, over 1,000 companies internationally user BeQRious for their QR Code needs. Over 3 million BeQRious QR Codes are in circulation on a daily basis.

BeQRious also works with companies to create Mobile Applications, Mobile Website development and campaigns centered around Near Field Communications (NFC).

BeQRious runs three sister sites: QRCodeTracking.com, CustomQRCodes.com and QRNibbles.

The company was founded in 2009 and the President of the company is Jeff Hawthorne. Guy Barretta is the Marketing and Sales Director and John Varracalli is the Chief Technology Officer.
